abstract: ABC News ended an investigation into a consultant it fired for falsifying his résumé and concluded that the reporting he contributed to the network was sound.
snippet: ABC News ended an investigation into a consultant it fired for falsifying his résumé and concluded that the reporting he contributed to the network was sound.
lead_paragraph: ABC News said yesterday that it had ended an investigation into a consultant whom it fired for falsifying his résumé and concluded that the reporting he had contributed to the network was sound.

headline.main: In Inquiry, ABC News Clears Work of a Fired Consultant
headline.print_headline: In Inquiry, ABC News Clears Work of a Fired Consultant
